channel.title: Turning Point Radio
channel.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
channel.description: Listen to the radio ministry of Dr. Jeremiah.

image.title: Turning Point Radio
image.description: Listen to the radio ministry of Dr. Jeremiah.

item.title: The Subject Nobody Talks About
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.description: The Bible talks about it often, but most of us would rather not. Dr. David Jeremiah discusses death. What did wise King Solomon have to say about this uncomfortable topic?
item.itunes:summary: The Bible talks about it often, but most of us would rather not. Dr. David Jeremiah discusses death. What did wise King Solomon have to say about this uncomfortable topic?

item.title: Before It's Too Late (Pt. 2)
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.description: If you’re finding that life is a mystery, you’re in good company. Solomon came to that same conclusion, but he wasn’t content to leave it at that. Dr. David Jeremiah gives a timely reminder that the mysteries of life are well worth examining.
item.itunes:summary: If you’re finding that life is a mystery, you’re in good company. Solomon came to that same conclusion, but he wasn’t content to leave it at that. Dr. David Jeremiah gives a timely reminder that the mysteries of life are well worth examining.

item.title: Before It's Too Late (Pt. 1)
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.description: If you’re a Christian, you have the hope of eternal life. But that doesn’t mean you should be less passionate about this life. Dr. David Jeremiah explains why that’s so important for believers, and shares other truths of life revealed by wise King Solomon in the closing chapters of Ecclesiastes.
item.itunes:summary: If you’re a Christian, you have the hope of eternal life. But that doesn’t mean you should be less passionate about this life. Dr. David Jeremiah explains why that’s so important for believers, and shares other truths of life revealed by wise King Solomon in the closing chapters of Ecclesiastes.

item.title: Fools Rush In (Pt. 2)
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.description: Are you really living wisely, or are you just “wise in your own eyes”? The difference between the two is enormous, and the consequences are eternal. Dr. David Jeremiah returns to the book of Ecclesiastes, where Solomon has identified foolishness in some areas of life you might not have considered.
item.itunes:summary: Are you really living wisely, or are you just “wise in your own eyes”? The difference between the two is enormous, and the consequences are eternal. Dr. David Jeremiah returns to the book of Ecclesiastes, where Solomon has identified foolishness in some areas of life you might not have considered.

item.title: Fools Rush In (Pt. 1)
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.description: We’re often quick to find foolishness in others, while failing to see it in our own lives. That’s why we need the mirror of God’s Word. Dr. David Jeremiah sheds light on foolishness in some common areas of life, as noted by King Solomon in his book of Ecclesiastes.
item.itunes:summary: We’re often quick to find foolishness in others, while failing to see it in our own lives. That’s why we need the mirror of God’s Word. Dr. David Jeremiah sheds light on foolishness in some common areas of life, as noted by King Solomon in his book of Ecclesiastes.
